value:
Time to get dressed... W-wait a
minute! Where's Setsuna? Ah.
I guess she's not here.

In Hoshido, it's a custom to go to the
hot springs in winter. They're just the
thing to warm up when it's cold out.

Even if it feels good, don't spend
too much time soaking in the hot
water. You'll get light-headed.

Sure, you're welcome to join me at
the hot spring.

Lately, it's been battle after battle...
We've earned this, and we need it,
too. Taking care of yourself is vital.

Somehow I wandered all the way
here, looking for my clothes... Back
to $Nf's castle!

I feel as light as a feather! Must be
that rejuvenating water.

I'm feeling good... Just a little bit
of a soak, and I'll be ready to go!

There's no way I can give it my all
dressed only in a towel!
What a feeling! That hot spring... Wow!

Who's there? I'm bathing in here!
Don't you have any manners?

What wonderful water! I was able to
fully relax and recover from all those
battles I've been fighting...$k$pIt's a little strange to be fighting in a
towel, but it's perfect for cooling off.
Let's leave it at that.$k$pI got a little nervous when I ran into
that Nohrian princess... But nobody
wanted to ruin the mood.$k$pIn this world, we are allies, after all.
We were able to soak side by side
without quarrel.$k$pJust thinking about it makes me want
to take another quick dip... Next time,
I'll invite Sakura and Setsuna!
はぁ
ふぅ
きゃああっ！
けだものめ…！
I was busy!
The water's fine!
I don't even need armor!
N-no peeking!
Suddenly I'm chilly...
What?
We heading out? Give me a minute to change. Oh, wait... I don't have anything to change into.
Don't even think about sneaking up on me right now.
There's nothing more refreshing than a cool breeze after a dip in a hot spring.
Finding time to relax is important. Especially when you're at war.
I wasn't asleep! I'm always alert!
The second I slip into a hot spring, every muscle in my body relaxes...
Whoever took my towel is going to pay!
Hmm...
Where's the hot spring?
Time to work up a sweat.
